sentences.english: Today is not one of those days. Outside, the sun is shining, birds are chirping and the dogwood tree is getting ready to bloom.
sentences.chinese: 外面，阳光明媚，鸟儿啁啾，山茱萸树正待开花。

sentences.english: It shows that negative chirp can improve the dispersion characteristics of system.
sentences.chinese: 分析结果表明，利用负啁啾可以改善系统的色散特性。

sentences.english: It was an intuitionist method for judge whether have a chirp in laser pulse.
sentences.chinese: 这种方法能够直观的检测光脉冲是否含有啁啾。

sentences.english: Birds had begun to chirp and twitter among the trees.
sentences.chinese: 鸟儿开始在树丛中啁啾鸣啭。

sentences.english: until one morning Gary shoots a bird that's chirping outside the window.
sentences.chinese: 次日晨，盖瑞举枪射杀了一只在窗外啁啾的小鸟。

sentences.english: The magpies were chattering in the trees.
When the lark in the sky sings joyfully.
sentences.chinese: 百灵鸟儿在空中欢快啁啾哟。

sentences.english: Birds are chirping merrily in the trees behind you.
sentences.chinese: 鸟儿在你身后的树上愉快地啁啾。

sentences.english: The birds are singing and the forest floor is dappled with sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 鸟儿啁啾，森林里露出缕缕阳光。

definition: to emit a sound/(of birds, insects etc) to chirp, hoot etc/(of a siren, steam whistle etc) to sound
to go off like a rocket/to rocket
